actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide for certain minimum requirements relating to the addressing of mail which is intended for general distribution to persons on rural routes, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth minimum requirments for the addressing of mail intended for distribution on rural routes.

titles.title: A bill to provide for certain minimum requirements relating to the addressing of mail which is intended for general distribution to persons on rural routes, and for other purposes.
